dcterms:creator: Y. Yang
S. Newsam
dcterms:description: The UC Merced Land-Use dataset (UCML-21) contains images derived from manually extracting large images from the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) National Map Urban Area Imagery Collection. It includes 21 categories of land-use scenes, with each category containing 100 images of size 256 × 256 pixels.
dcterms:title: UC Merced Land-Use Dataset (UCML-21)

dcterms:creator: G. Cheng
J. Han
X. Lu
dcterms:description: The NWPU-RESISC45 dataset (NWPU-45) is a large-scale public dataset for remote sensing image scene classification, containing 45 categories of scenes, with each category containing 700 images of size 256 × 256 pixels. It is extracted from Google Earth and covers more than 100 countries and regions.
dcterms:title: NWPU-RESISC45 Dataset (NWPU-45)

dcterms:description: The HSI-LiDAR Houston2013 dataset combines hyperspectral and LiDAR data for in-depth studies on land cover and environmental changes. It includes high-resolution WorldView-2 satellite imagery collected in 2013, with hyperspectral data comprising 144 bands and a single-band LiDAR image.
dcterms:title: HSI-LiDAR Houston2013 Dataset
